attributes.action: Create a Citizens Assembly on climate and ecological justice.
attributes.additional_details:
We can stop the death of our world but we must take action. The first step is to show our government that we want them to do more. Creating a Citizens Assembly will bring people together to investigate, discuss and make recommendations on responding to the climate emergency. We have great power to innovate, create and heal, the first step you can take is to sign this petition.

"This is an emergency and for emergency situations we need emergency action.”

Ban Ki-Moon, former UN Secretary General
attributes.background:
NASA has stated that the current global climate warming has a 'greater than 95% probability of being caused by human activity'.

This is leading to:
*Water shortage
*Crop failure
*Extreme weather
*Death of people, animals, plants, trees and ocean life.
If you love life please sign.
